commodities.dataaccess.database
Class AccessDataManager

java.lang.Object
  commodities.dataaccess.database.AccessDataManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
DataManagerInterface
public class AccessDataManager
extends Object
implements DataManagerInterface

The interface for all of the data accesses in the commodity system.

Version:
1.0
Author:
J.R. Titko
Updated:
2004.11.11

updateOrderEntry

public void updateOrderEntry(long id,
                             int acctNumber,
                             boolean buyOrder,
                             Date date,
                             Integer number,
                             String month,
                             String commodityName,
                             Double desiredPrice,
                             Double stopPrice,
                             String status,
                             Double actualPrice,
                             String note,
                             long offsettingOrder,
                             Date dateConsidered,
                             Date datePlaced,
                             Date dateFilled,
                             Date dateCancelPlaced,
                             Date dateCancelled,
                             Date dateStopLoss)
                      throws IOException
Updates an entry for the orders. If the order does not exist, it is added.

Specified by:
updateOrderEntry in interface DataManagerInterface
Parameters:
id - the id of this order
acctNumber - the account number of the owner of this order
buyOrder - true if buy order; false if sell order
date - date the transaction was recorded for
number - number of contracts in order
month - contract month in mmm yy format
commodityName - commodity name and exchange
desiredPrice - the desired price of the contract
stopPrice - the stop loss price of the contract
status - the status of the contract
note - the note of the order
actualPrice - the actual price of the contract
offsettingOrder - the offsetting order for this contract
dateConsidered - the date the order was considered
datePlaced - the date the order was placed
dateFilled - the date the order was filled
dateCancelPlaced - the date the cancel order was placed
dateCancelled - the date the order was cancelled
dateStopLoss - the date the stoploss was filled
Throws:
IOException - there was a problem accessing the database table

returns a collection of the rows returned
